attributes.title: Deleted
attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to App Store and Google Play Store. It had illegal ads, IT LEFT A VIRUS ON MY PHONE, it asked me personal questions that made me uncomfortable and I feel violated.

attributes.title: absolutely horrible.
attributes.review: this app is almost as bad as the president himself. it has nothing to offer and i cannot understand for the life of me why it even exists. hoping it gets removed off the app store just as i’m hoping the orange peel we have as a president gets removed from office.
